items.question: Can I cancel my subscription at anytime?
items.answer: Sure. Your paid subscription can be cancelled anytime by shifting to Lite plan.

items.question: Can I change my plan later on?
items.answer: You can switch plans anytime from your billing page. Changes prorate automatically.

items.question: Will you renew my subscription automatically?
items.answer: Yes, renewals are automatic. You can cancel before the renewal date to avoid charges.

items.question: Do you offer any discounts?
items.answer: Annual plans come with a discount. Contact support for volume pricing.

items.question: Can I request a refund?
items.answer: Eligible refunds are handled within 14 days of purchase. Reach out via support.

html: <bob-panel id='content'>
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='showTitle' label='Show title' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' databinding='title' path='title' label='FAQ title' hint='Frequently Asked Questions' value='{{title}}' show-if="showTitle == 'true'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='search.enabled' label='Show search bar' />

<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' databinding='search.placeholder' path='search.placeholder' label='Search placeholder' hint='Search...' value='{{search.placeholder}}' show-if="search.enabled == 'true'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='displayCategoryTitles' label='Display category titles' />

<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='lg' databinding='categoryTitle' path='categoryTitle' label='Category title' hint='All Questions' value='{{categoryTitle}}' show-if="displayCategoryTitles == 'true'" />

<tooldrawer-field type='repeatable-list' size='md' path='items' label='Questions' placeholder='Add question' options='[{"key":"question","label":"Question","type":"text"},{"key":"answer","label":"Answer","type":"textarea"},{"key":"category","label":"Category","type":"text"},{"key":"defaultOpen","label":"Open by default","type":"toggle"},{"key":"ctaText","label":"CTA text","type":"text"},{"key":"ctaHref","label":"CTA link","type":"text"},{"key":"mediaUrl","label":"Media URL","type":"text"}]' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='layout'>

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='lg' path='layout.type' label='Layout' placeholder='Choose layout' value='{{layout.type}}' options='[{"label":"Accordion","value":"accordion"},{"label":"List","value":"list"},{"label":"Multicolumn","value":"multicolumn"},{"label":"Side nav","value":"side-nav"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='lg' path='layout.searchPlacement' label='Search placement' placeholder='Choose placement' value='{{layout.searchPlacement}}' options='[{"label":"Near title","value":"title"},{"label":"Below title","value":"below"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='layout.showCategories' label='Show categories' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='layout.stickyNav' label='Sticky category navigation' show-if="layout.showCategories == 'true'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='slider' size='md' path='layout.columns.desktop' label='Columns (Desktop)' min='1' max='4' value='{{layout.columns.desktop}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='slider' size='md' path='layout.columns.tablet' label='Columns (Tablet)' min='1' max='3' value='{{layout.columns.tablet}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='slider' size='md' path='layout.columns.mobile' label='Columns (Mobile)' min='1' max='2' value='{{layout.columns.mobile}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='slider' size='md' path='layout.gap' label='Item gap (px)' min='0' max='64' value='{{layout.gap}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='slider' size='md' path='layout.padding' label='Padding (px)' min='0' max='64' value='{{layout.padding}}' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='appearance'>
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='lg' path='stage.background' label='Stage fill' placeholder='var(--color-system-gray-5)' value='{{stage.background}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='lg' path='pod.background' label='Widget fill' placeholder='var(--color-system-white)' value='{{pod.background}}' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.template' label='Template' placeholder='Choose template' value='{{appearance.template}}' options='[{"label":"Clear","value":"clear"},{"label":"Background","value":"background"},{"label":"Background & Shadow","value":"background-shadow"},{"label":"Background & Border","value":"background-border"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='lg' path='appearance.itemBackground' label='Item background' placeholder='#f9f9fb' value='{{appearance.itemBackground}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='lg' path='appearance.questionColor' label='Question color' placeholder='#0f0f10' value='{{appearance.questionColor}}' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.questionSize' label='Question size' placeholder='md' value='{{appearance.questionSize}}' options='[{"label":"Small","value":"sm"},{"label":"Medium","value":"md"},{"label":"Large","value":"lg"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='lg' path='appearance.answerColor' label='Answer color' placeholder='#3f3f46' value='{{appearance.answerColor}}' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.answerSize' label='Answer size' placeholder='sm' value='{{appearance.answerSize}}' options='[{"label":"Small","value":"sm"},{"label":"Medium","value":"md"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.iconStyle' label='Accordion icon' placeholder='Choose icon' value='{{appearance.iconStyle}}' options='[{"label":"Plus","value":"plus"},{"label":"Arrow","value":"arrow"}]' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.iconSize' label='Icon size' placeholder='md' value='{{appearance.iconSize}}' options='[{"label":"Small","value":"sm"},{"label":"Medium","value":"md"},{"label":"Large","value":"lg"}]' />
<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-fill' size='lg' path='appearance.iconColor' label='Icon color' placeholder='#3f3f46' value='{{appearance.iconColor}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.cardBorder' label='Card border' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='appearance.cardShadow' label='Card shadow' />

<tooldrawer-field type='dropdown-actions' size='md' path='appearance.cardRadius' label='Card radius' placeholder='lg' value='{{appearance.cardRadius}}' options='[{"label":"Sm","value":"sm"},{"label":"Md","value":"md"},{"label":"Lg","value":"lg"},{"label":"Xl","value":"xl"}]' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='behavior'>
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandFirst' label='Open first question by default' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.expandAll' label='Expand all questions' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.multiOpen' label='Allow multiple open' show-if="layout.type == 'accordion'" />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.shuffle' label='Shuffle question order' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.displayVideos' label='Display videos' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.displayImages' label='Display images' />
<tooldrawer-field type='toggle' size='md' path='behavior.showBacklink' label='Show backlink' />
</bob-panel>
<bob-panel id='advanced'>
<tooldrawer-field type='textfield' size='md' databinding='customCss' path='customCss' label='Custom CSS' hint='/* Custom CSS */' value='{{customCss}}' />
<tooldrawer-field type='textedit' size='md' databinding='behavior.customJs' path='behavior.customJs' label='Custom JS' placeholder='// Custom JS (state available as "state")' />
</bob-panel>
